A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really disappointed supposed fans are making Star Wars political?? I didn’t even notice all the social justice crap I’m hearing about\, I got lost in the story like I did as a kid watching the originals. This was great story telling\, action\, and a few unexpected turns. My kids all teens could care less about the political and loved the movie. Save the political stuff and leave Star Wars alone fans\, it’s an easy film to love.
